$description: Core border radius primitives using numeric scale. Values are rem-based for accessibility.

100.$description: Extra small radius (2px). Use for: small badges, tags, inline code.

200.$description: Small radius (4px). DEFAULT for small components. Use for: buttons, inputs.

300.$description: Medium-small radius (6px). Use for: between sm and md.

400.$description: Medium radius (8px). Use for: cards, modals, larger containers.

600.$description: Medium-large radius (12px). Use for: between md and lg.

800.$description: Large radius (16px). Use for: hero cards, featured content.

1000.$description: Extra large radius (24px). Use for: hero sections, large promotional elements.

1200.$description: 2X large radius (32px). Use for: very large cards.

full.$description: Full/pill radius (circular). Use for: avatars, round buttons, pills.
